languages.text:
"...мидесяти полкам Астра Милитарум, отправленным на ледяной мир Зенераг II, требовалось снабжение теплой одеждой, обувью и снегоступами для успешного боевого маневра с дальнейшим наступлением на врагов Человечества и Императора. Из-за грубейшей ошибки адепта низшего звена Адептус Администратум вместо перечисленных позиций солдаты получили восемь сотен криобатарей, в результате чего большинство замерзли насмерть до начала выполнения карательной миссии.
В целях повышения функциональности виновный адепт подвергся сервиторизации, благодаря чему с блеском выполняет новые, возложенные на него задачи".

traits.locale_text:
"…мидесяти полкам Астра Милитарум, отправленным на ледяной мир Зенераг II, требовалось снабжение теплой одеждой, обувью и снегоступами для успешного боевого маневра с дальнейшим наступлением на врагов Человечества и Императора. Из-за грубейшей ошибки адепта низшего звена Астра Администратум вместо перечисленных позиций солдаты получили восемь сотен криобатарей, в результате чего большинство замерзли насмерть до начала выполнения карательной миссии.
В целях повышения функциональности виновный адепт подвергся сервиторизации, благодаря чему с блеском выполняет новые, возложенные на него задачи".

languages.text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."
languages.original_text:
"...мидесяти полкам Астра Милитарум, отправленным на ледяной мир Зенераг II, требовалось снабжение теплой одеждой, обувью и снегоступами для успешного боевого маневра с дальнейшим наступлением на врагов Человечества и Императора. languages.text:
“星界军的几十个军团被派往冰封世界泽内加二号。士兵们需要保暖衣物、鞋袜与雪地靴，才能顺利进军，对人类与帝皇的敌人展开进一步攻击。然而，由于帝国内政部某位低级官员的严重失职，士兵们收到的补给并非上述提到的物资，而是八百个冷冻箱。这一失职行为，导致绝大部分士兵尚未来得及执行反击计划，就冻死在了战场上。
为了提高效率，相关失职官员已经接受了奴役仪典。目前，该官员正在完美地履行他的职责。”
languages.original_text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."

为了提高效率，相关失职官员已经接受了奴役仪典。目前，该官员正在完美地履行他的职责。”

languages.text:
«... nta regimientos del Astra Militarum se envíen al mundo helado Zenegar II junto con los suministros necesarios de ropa y calzado aislante y botas de nieve para la realización de maniobras de combate exitosas en una ofensiva contra los enemigos de la Humanidad y el Emperador. Debido a un craso error de un adepto de bajo rango del Adeptus Administratum, en lugar de los suministros previamente mencionados, los soldados recibieron 800 bancos criogénicos, causando como resultado la muerte por congelación de la mayor parte de las tropas antes del comienzo de la misión de retribución.
Con propósito de mejorar su eficiencia, el adepto responsable fue sometido a Servidumbre Imperpituis, gracias a lo cual ahora cumple con sus deberes de forma impecable».
languages.original_text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."

traits.locale_text:
«... nta regimientos del Astra Militarum se envíen al mundo helado Zenegar II junto con los suministros necesarios de ropa y calzado aislante y botas de nieve para la realización de maniobras de combate exitosas en una ofensiva contra los enemigos de la Humanidad y el Emperador. Debido a un craso error de un adepto de bajo rango del Astra Administratum, en lugar de los suministros previamente mencionados, los soldados recibieron 800 bancos criogénicos, causando como resultado la muerte por congelación de la mayor parte de las tropas antes del comienzo de la misión de retribución.
Con propósito de mejorar su eficiencia, el adepto responsable fue sometido a Servidumbre Imperpituis, gracias a lo cual ahora cumple con sus deberes de forma impecable».

languages.text:
「―帝国防衛軍の連隊が極寒の惑星ツェネガーIIに送られ、人類と皇帝の敵に対して更なる攻勢をかける大規模軍事作戦の成功のために、防寒具、履き物、雪靴の物資を要求した。下級の帝国行政局が犯した大きな過ちのために、兵士が上記の物資の代わりに受け取ったのは800個の低温保存装置であり、軍の大部分は報復作戦の開始前に凍死した。
効率改善目的で責任者自ら不眠奉仕の刑に処し、今では完全に無罪放免となっている」
languages.original_text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."

効率改善目的で責任者自ら不眠奉仕の刑に処し、今では完全に無罪放免となっている」

languages.text:
« —ante régiments de l'Astra Militarum envoyés sur le monde gelé de Zenegar-II. Demande a été faite de leur fournir des vêtements chauds et des chaussures adaptées aux conditions locales afin de mener l'offensive contre les ennemis de l'Empereur et de l'humanité. Suite à une grossière erreur de la part d'un agent subalterne de l'Adeptus Administratum, au lieu des équipements requis, les soldats ont reçu 800 capsules cryogéniques et la majorité des troupes sont mortes avant même que la mission ne commence.
Afin d'optimiser l'efficacité de nos services, l'agent responsable a été soumis à la Servitude Imperpituis et s'acquitte désormais de sa tâche avec un zèle irréprochable. »
languages.original_text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."

traits.locale_text:
"—ante régiments de l'Astra Militarum envoyés sur le monde gelé de Zenegar-II. Demande a été faite de leur fournir des vêtements chauds et des chaussures adaptées aux conditions locales afin de mener l'offensive contre les ennemis de l'Empereur et de l'humanité. Suite à une grossière erreur de la part d'un agent subalterne de l'Astra Administratum, au lieu des équipements requis, les soldats ont reçu 800 capsules cryogéniques et la majorité des troupes sont mortes avant même que la mission ne commence.
Afin d'optimiser l'efficacité de nos services, l'agent responsable a été soumis à la Servitude Imperpituis et s'acquitte désormais de sa tâche avec un zèle irréprochable. »

languages.text:
"...ig Regimenter des Astra Militarum auf die Eiswelt Zenegar II geschickt. Sie benötigten warme Kleidung, Schuhe und Schneeschuhe für einen erfolgreichen Kampfeinsatz bei einer weiteren Offensive gegen die Feinde der Menschheit und des Imperators. Aufgrund eines groben Fehlers durch einen rangniederen Adepten des Adeptus Administratum erhielten die Soldaten statt der soeben aufgeführten Ausrüstung 800 Cryobänke, was dazu führte, dass der Großteil der Truppen erfroren war, bevor die Vergeltungsmission überhaupt beginnen konnte.
Zur Steigerung der Effektivität wurde der verantwortliche Adept der Servitut Imperpituis unterzogen. Jetzt erfüllt er seine Pflichten fehlerfrei."
languages.original_text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."

traits.locale_text: "...ig Regimenter des Astra Militarum auf die Eiswelt Zenegar II geschickt. Sie benötigten warme Kleidung, Schuhe und Schneeschuhe für einen erfolgreichen Kampfeinsatz bei einer weiteren Offensive gegen die Feinde der Menschheit und des Imperators. Aufgrund eines groben Fehlers durch einen rangniederen Adepten des Astra Administratum erhielten die Soldaten statt der soeben aufgeführten Ausrüstung 800 Cryobänke, was dazu führte, dass der Großteil der Truppen erfroren war, bevor die Vergeltungsmission überhaupt beginnen konnte.Zur Steigerung der Effektivität wurde der verantwortliche Adept der Servitut Imperpituis unterzogen. Jetzt erfüllt er seine Pflichten fehlerfrei."

languages.text:
"Zenegar II donuk dünyasına gönderilen Astra Militarum alaylarının, İnsanlığın ve İmparator'un düşmanlarına karşı saldırıya geçerek başarılı operasyonlar yürütebilmesi için kalın giysiler, çizmeler ve kar ayakkabısının bulunduğu erzaklara ihtiyacı vardı. Düşük rütbeli bir Adeptus Administratum üstadının büyük bir hatası yüzünden, askerlere yukarıda bahsi geçen erzaklar yerine 800 adet kriyobank ulaştı ve bu sebeple intikam misyonu başlayamadan birliklerin büyük bir kısmı donarak can verdi.
Verimliliği artırmak amacıyla bundan sorumlu olan üstat, Müebbet Hizmet'e mahkûm edilmiş olup artık görevini kusursuzca yerine getirmektedir."
languages.original_text:
"—ty regiments of the Astra Militarum sent to the frozen world of Zenegar II, required supplies of warm clothing, footwear, and snowshoes for a successful combat manoeuvre with a further offensive against the enemies of Humanity and the Emperor. Due to a gross error by a low-ranking adept of the Adeptus Administratum, instead of the aforementioned supplies, soldiers received 800 cryobanks, resulting in the death by freezing of the majority of troops before the commencement of the mission of retribution.
For the purposes of improving efficiency, the adept responsible was subjected to Servitude Imperpituis, as a result of which he is now discharging his duties flawlessly."
